short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost your productivity with the Pomodoro Timer! Stay focused by working in timed intervals and take refreshing breaks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Maximize your productivity with the Pomodoro Timer! This simple yet powerful extension helps you stay focused, manage your time effectively, and avoid burnout by working in structured intervals.

Key Features:
Customizable Work & Break Intervals: Set your preferred Pomodoro duration and break times to fit your personal workflow.
Notifications & Alerts: Receive friendly notifications when it's time to take a break or get back to work. Stay on track without constantly checking the clock.
Progress Tracking: Easily track how many Pomodoros you've completed during the day to see your progress and keep motivated.
Sleek, Minimalist Design: Enjoy a distraction-free experience with a clean interface that integrates seamlessly into your workflow.

How It Works:
The Pomodoro technique is a proven time management method. You work for a set period (typically 25 minutes), followed by a short break (5 minutes). After four Pomodoro cycles, you take a longer break (15â€“30 minutes). This extension helps you follow this method with automated timers and notifications, so you can concentrate on your tasks.

Whether you're studying, working from home, or tackling your to-do list, the Pomodoro Timer will help you manage your time better and stay productive throughout the day.
